caption: Clothing hangs on a line, gently swaying and billowing in the breeze against a dark backdrop. The fabric catches the light, creating a play of shadows and highlights as it moves rhythmically. The scene is serene, with the soft rustling of the garments adding a soothing soundtrack to the quiet night.
